entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Athabasca 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
